mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TODO_ITEM(CONTENT, SEQ) SELECT #{content}, (SELECT COALESCE(MAX(SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM TODO_ITEM)
mapper.select: SELECT ID, CONTENT, COMPLETED, SEQ FROM TODO_ITEM ORDER BY SEQ
mapper.update: UPDATE TODO_ITEM SET COMPLETED = #{completed}, CONTENT = coalesce(nullif(#{content}, ""), content) WHERE ID = #{id}
